channel.title: My server's run.bat problems?help please!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/n88lk.jpg[/img] I currently have 2 problems, 1)When i start the server it only listens on port 0.0.0.0:43594 (top cmd prompt pic) how do i change it? (I have tried editing the client side ip.not working.)
2)The bottom pic the client's run.bat says it cant find the jframe class.Help me?
All the help is appreciated.thank you Also,im using this source http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=511978.0 oh,sorry about the title it isnt MY server.credits 100% to the creator of dimescape.

item.title: My server's run.bat problems?help please!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:5, topic:471303”]i take that back, i wont help you. your so loveing stupid

first off; why do you wanna change the port that the server is ran on?

second; you just answered your own question. it cant find jframe.class. see where the bat file is dir to[/quote]
I think he was trying to edit server ip 0.0.0.0
Lol it’s just text that gets edited in there…

Read full topic

item.title: My server's run.bat problems?help please!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

What in the holy…
PI’s don’t even run on a server IP. That’s just edited in there.
The other CMD error is because you’re compiler can’t find Jframe.class.

Read full topic
